title: Approach to plinth level :- Every building should have at least one entrance accessible to the differently abled and shall be indicated by proper signage
clause_text: Approach to plinth level :- Every building should have at least one entrance accessible to the differently abled and shall be indicated by proper signage. This entrance shall be approached through a ramp together with the stepped entry.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
